item.title: about me
item.description: Product Manager of Cloudflare Workers Cat parent Excited about serverless Baker of pastries Talks I’ve done Real World Serverless, San Francisco: Workers in the Wilderness Serverless Days, Milan: Optimizing performance, reliability and cost with Cloudflare Workers DevOpsCon, Berlin: Practical Approach to Adopting Serverless SoundBoard, Athens, GA: The Importance of Preparing For DDOS Attacks
